title: Allow changing the country and name after registration on Windows Phone Store, PubCenter and Windows Store
body: Allow changing the country and name after registration on Windows Phone Store, PubCenter and Windows Store.

comments.body: I'm moving from EU to US permanently and won't be able to receive payments to my non-US account by end of Q2 2016. This is a major issue for me (and as I can see many others) to not being able to change the country/billing address and bank account from different country.

I am a mobile worker, moving across countries, once in a while.  If I create a developer account, I would like to have an option to change the base country I am in.  I know this scenario may not represent a need in most of the people, but if there are quite a good number of people like me, it is an suggestion worth implementing.
